name: When will you meet your soulmate (QUIZ)
name_original: When will you meet your soulmate (QUIZ)
description:
Warning: Lights, Loud noises, fast paced moments.

(13 +) sensitive content

Answer questions, listen to music, and learn about yourself in this fun valentines day themed quiz!

May have issues when running natively on IOS

Credits:

All programming, writing, and some art and audio was done by me, other credits below:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gl9xChxluGqIUgvut66MzvCUfvcyLwFU_Sb3zAQrdzY/... 

This came out cringer than what I was going for but I hope you all like it! I have a VR dating sim, and a more story driven platformer I'm working on too right now. I just thought this was a cool idea, and wanted to make it!
